titleStmt.title: Reasons of a challenge sent to the universities of England, in matters of religion by Edmund Campion ; faithfully translated into English.
titleStmt.author: Campion, Edmund, Saint, 1540-1581.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Translated from: Les Dix raisons proposées aux academies d'Angleterre sur les matières de la foy, par le P. Edmond Campian. cf. BM.
